title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Direct Volunteer Support

description.narrative: Support costs incurred for direct support of volunteers in Nepal, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Overseas Program Support

description.narrative: Overseas program support costs in Nepal. Includes overseas staff salaries and benefit costs, leases, staff travel, communications, conferences, supplies, equipment and International Cooperative Administrative Support Services (ICASS). Excludes costs for training, medical and security.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Safety and Security

description.narrative: Volunteer safety and security costs in Nepal directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
